examples: he was carefully honing the curved blade

verb.description: Refine or perfect (something) over a period of time.
examples: she has taken numerous workshops to hone her skills over the years
the detectives honed in on the suspect
I started to hone in on the problem

noun.description: A whetstone, especially one used to sharpen razors.

origin: Middle English: from Old English hān stone, of Germanic origin; related to Old Norse hein.
